name: Damn Girl: relationship quest game
description:
Have you noticed that all girls are different? What to do to get the one you like?
There are 16 socionomy types of the girl. Each of them has its own specialties. Some people are attracted by what others can’t stand. Get to know one of the socionomy type.

◉ Find all the scenarios
◉ Find 150 unique endings
◉ Improve your communication and pick-up skills
◉ Reach new statuses
